analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x3e85b55ff8bfc4ebfd0244fe5b8eec13655e9580.sol:
	Contract hoot has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x3e85b55ff8bfc4ebfd0244fe5b8eec13655e9580.sol#288-290)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/17/0x3e85b55ff8bfc4ebfd0244fe5b8eec13655e9580.sol#93) is not in mixedCase
